resources.string: The current state of the app:

Below you can select a different icon and name for this app and transfer it to another device. For instance to your friends. 

First, you pick an icon and name for the app. You can even copy an existing app and use its name and icon! 

Second, when you are ready you press the share button. Or, if both this device and the receiving device have NFC enabled, hold both devices back to back.
Pick an application from the list below in order to copy its icon and name.
